summary: TAKATA RECALL - JUST BOUGHT CAR 3 MTHA AGO, I PULLED OVER BECAUSE MY SON WASNT FEELING GOOD FROM THE HEAT.  TRIED TO PUT KEY IN IGNITION SWITH AND DIDNT GO IN OR TURN ON SWITCH. ON.SINGLE MOTHER, NO FAMILY, OR FRIENDS. JUST MOVED FROM NEVADA. NO MONEY AT THE TIME. MY SON OVERHEATED  AND MY SON GOT DEHYDRATED. NO FAITH IN HONDA CIVICS ANYMORE. MY SON ALMOST DIED FOR ITBTO AN EXPIRED RECALL. NOW I HAVE TO TAKE FROM THEIR FIOD MONEY TO FIX THE CAR. HOW DISAPPOINTED.
